mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USERS (USER_NUMBER, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_MAJOR, USER_BIRTH, USER_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_USERS_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, #{userId},#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userNickname} ,#{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userMajor}, #{userBirth}, '1')
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUMBER, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_MAJOR, TO_CHAR(USER_BIRTH, 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') AS USER_BIRTH, USER_LEVEL FROM TBL_USERS WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber, jdbcType=BIGINT}
